description: Approval of reserved matters to determine the landscaping of the site pursuant to outline approval DM2022/00580 dated 17.12.2024 (to determine access, appearance, layout and scale for the erection of two detached two storey buildings with accommodation in roofspace comprising 8 self contained residential units including integrated refuse and cycle stores, car parking accessed via a new vehicular access to/from Malden Road).
